Articles.Content: When I assembly a veichle sometimes if I use particular parts like farings ir crash. When I launch the first veichle I have loe fps but When I click "launch" in VAB for the second time ksp crash! I Have a 32 bit computer with 4 gb ram. I use only 3 mods: spaceY hyperedit trajectories. Please help me

Are your mods up-to-date? Are you running the right versions for the right version of KSP.

If you're on 32-bit it's very likely you're running out of memory and you should try playing stock KSP.
